item.title: My sister and her husband died within days of each other. Their banks won’t let me access their safe-deposit boxes. What now?
item.description: “The bank suggested filing a claim for unclaimed property in the state where I reside.”

item.title: Google’s Gemini transparency cut leaves enterprise developers ‘debugging blind’
item.description: Why is Google hiding Gemini's reasoning traces? The decision sparks a debate over black-box models versus the need for transparency.

item.title: I’m 51, earn $129K and have $165K in my 401(k). Can I afford to retire when my husband, 59, draws Social Security at 62?
item.description: “He is retired from a state job and receives a pension that nets around $3,600 per month, as well as lifelong health insurance for both of us.”

item.title: ‘I’m at my wit’s end’: My niece paid off her husband’s credit card but fell behind on her taxes. How can I help her?
item.description: “My niece, as smart and brilliant as she is, is not very good with her money.”
